eWhiteboard for lecture notes
eWhiteboard for exercises
This online script

The above links can also be found at eCampus.
For students not yet in Bonn, I’ll stream the lectures via Zoom (Meeting-ID: 992 8328 7705, Pwd: 708587) during the first lecture weeks.



It’s not must, but you can read any of the usual econometrics textbooks additionally to this script. I can recommend the following ones, but there are many other good books:

Probability and Statistics for Economists, by Bruce E. Hansen
Econometrics, by Bruce E. Hansen
Econometrics, by F. Hayashi 
Introduction to econometrics, by J. Stock and M.W. Watson

E-Book: https://bonnus.ulb.uni-bonn.de/SummonRecord/FETCH-bonn_catalog_45089983

Econometric theory and methods, by R. Davidson and J.G. MacKinnon
